comment: This is a rectangular text box containing Chinese characters in an ancient script (likely seal script or a similar form), arranged vertically in columns. The text includes both large characters (possibly headers or main entries) and smaller explanatory text (definitions, phonetic notes, etymologies). It appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicographical work, such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The right edge contains marginal annotations including '小三十二', '說文七上', '十三', and '繆春', which likely indicate volume, section, page number, and possibly the name of the annotator or publisher.
